# This file was generated by Jucer2Reprojucer from "JuceDemoPlugin.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

# Ugly, but can't set c++14 with CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++14")

list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/cmake")
include(Juce)

include_directories(src)

set(JUCE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/modules/JUCE5/modules")
set(VST3_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/modules/vst3sdk")

# Declare project
jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "5.2.0"
  PROJECT_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CMakeLists.txt"
  PROJECT_ID "0nRd9LLGO"
)

# Identification of the audio plugin
jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "Milion"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  COMPANY_NAME "Johan Lasperas"
  COMPANY_COPYRIGHT " "
  COMPANY_WEBSITE " "
  COMPANY_EMAIL "johan.lasperas@gmail.com"
  REPORT_JUCE_APP_USAGE OFF # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN OFF # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  SPLASH_SCREEN_COLOUR "Dark"
  PROJECT_TYPE "Audio Plug-in"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER " "
  BINARYDATACPP_SIZE_LIMIT "Default"
  # BINARYDATA_NAMESPACE
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
)

# Plugin base configuration
jucer_audio_plugin_settings(
  BUILD_VST OFF
  BUILD_VST3 OFF
  BUILD_AUDIOUNIT ON
  BUILD_AUDIOUNIT_V3 OFF
  BUILD_RTAS OFF
  BUILD_AAX OFF
  BUILD_STANDALONE_PLUGIN ON
  PLUGIN_NAME "Milion Audio Plugin"
  PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION "Milion Audio Plugin"
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER "Johan Lasperas"
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER_CODE "johanLsp"
  PLUGIN_CODE "Milion"
  PLUGIN_IS_A_SYNTH ON
  PLUGIN_MIDI_INPUT ON
  PLUGIN_MIDI_OUTPUT OFF
  MIDI_EFFECT_PLUGIN OFF
  KEY_FOCUS ON
  PLUGIN_AU_EXPORT_PREFIX "MilionAU"
  PLUGIN_CHANNEL_CONFIGURATIONS "{0, 1}"
  # PLUGIN_AU_MAIN_TYPE
  # VST_CATEGORY
  # PLUGIN_RTAS_CATEGORY
  PLUGIN_AAX_CATEGORY "AAX_ePlugInCategory_Dynamics"
  PLUGIN_AAX_IDENTIFIER "johan.lasperas@gmail.com"
)
